description: to provide competitive Enterprise Contact Centre Services (ECCS) to SSC clients
full_summary:
**Government Contact Centre Services (GCCS) Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** cb-8542-35662936

**Notice Date:** August 29, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** October 20, 2023, 2:00 PM ET

**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 7, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** September 10, 2031

**Supply Arrangement Information:**

The Government of Canada is seeking a Supply Arrangement (SA) for Enterprise Contact Centre Services (ECCS) to support Shared Services Canada's (SSC) clients. This SA will provide a list of pre-qualified Suppliers to compete in subsequent solicitations for the provision of ECCS services.

**Scope of Work:**

The ECCS scope includes the provision of communication services to government stakeholders, leveraging internal/external contact centre agents or automated self-service systems. The services encompass network and management operational activities for the call centre infrastructure. However, contact centre agents are not part of the scope.

**Security Requirements:**

Vendors must meet specific security requirements, including:

* Vendor Security Requirement: Protected A and Protected B document safeguarding
* Personnel Security Requirement: Reliability and Secret clearance

**Trade Agreements:**

This procurement is subject to the following Trade Agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Israel Free Trade Agreement

**To Respond:**

Prospective Suppliers must email the contracting authority to express interest via the Public Services and Procurement Canada's (PSPC) online procurement platform, P2P (BPM010227/F). Suppliers must be registered and logged into P2P to submit a bid. More information on the procurement process and details of the required documents can be found in the P2P platform.

**Attachments:**

Please visit Canada Buys to view the notice and attachment documents. [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

Thank you for your interest in this opportunity. Contact Andres Malette at andree-anne.malette@ssc-spc.gc.ca or (343) 598-7993 for further information.
